alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 7:17AM EDT until June 22 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN TAYLOR COUNTY... At 717 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 22 miles southwest of Perry, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pinland, Dekle Beach, Jug Island, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Salem, Blue Springs, Carbur, Athena, Cedar Island and Adams Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
